information_systems.name: Canvas Learning Management System
information_systems.primary_purpose: To manage and deliver educational content, assignments, grading, and communication between students and instructors.
information_systems.access_method: Web-based platform accessible through login at institutional Canvas portals or via the Canvas mobile app.
information_systems.information_structure: Course-centric structure, organizing data into courses, modules, assignments, users, and grades. This structure is appropriate for managing and tracking academic progress and participation.
information_systems.data_format: JSON for API interactions; CSV and Excel for grade exports and reports.

information_systems.name: Library Management System
information_systems.primary_purpose: To manage the acquisition, cataloging, circulation, and inventory of books and resources in a library.
information_systems.access_method: Accessible through a library’s internal network or public web portal by staff and patrons.
information_systems.information_structure: Relational database with tables for books, members, loans, and reservations—ideal for tracking availability and borrowing history.
information_systems.data_format: MARC, CSV, and XML for bibliographic and transaction data.

information_systems.name: Tableau
information_systems.primary_purpose: Business Intelligence (BI) and data visualization – to help users explore, analyze, and visualize data from various sources.
information_systems.access_method: Web-based and desktop application (Tableau Desktop, Tableau Server, or Tableau Online).
information_systems.information_structure: Star schema or flat table structure optimized for data visualization and fast querying.
information_systems.data_format: Supports multiple formats including CSV, Excel, JSON, SQL databases, and live data connectors.
